title: 認真討論新PlayStation plus對Game 舖既影響

replies.msg:
https://youtu.be/iEsLzh0xLZc

如果係比月費任玩
全世界啲PS4 Game舖，無論係賣全新又好，二手又好，咪通通死清光
依家啲人根本唔使再買

賣PS5只係死前最後一水

Sony Subscribe制嗰個服務叫PS NOW，香港無
呢個PSN+ Collection 目標係吸新客多

如果係比月費任玩

睇完依句就知唔使討論

我都唔知幾耐無落game鋪了
有愛嘅就即dl即玩
觀望嘅就等佢7折就入手
加上每月free game
部機啲game多到玩唔晒
最正係㩒幾個掣就有game玩
人大左唔會為慳一百幾十上網搵賣家約時間交收
Game 舖死有咩所謂？ sony 賺埋佢嗰份又煩少樣嘢

quote.msg:
如果係比月費任玩

睇完依句就知唔使討論

replies.msg:
唔係咩
Today, Sony announced that PS5 owners with an active PS Plus membership will have immediate access to something called the PlayStation Plus Collection. It's a small but impressive library that contains critically-acclaimed titles such as God of War, Bloodborne and The Last Guardian. If you own a PlayStation 4, there's a good chance that you've bought some of these games already. But if any of them are missing from your collection, or you skipped the PS4 generation entirely, you'll have access to them as soon as you make the leap to next-gen hardware.
